item.description:
UPSCALE YARD SALE

Do you have some nice things that are just too good to give away, but good enough to sell?

Or - are you looking for a good bargain?

Come sell and/or shop! Help spread the word - and invite all your friends and family to come shop!  Feel free to advertise, post notices, etc. at your work place and in your community.

All types of items are welcome... sporting goods, clothing, jewelry, pocket books, wallets, electronics, etc.

The only requirement is that it's in very good to excellent condition - new or like new.

Bring your stuff and bring your money to buy new stuff.  Maybe you can even do some bartering. Sellers get to keep all of their individual sales.

If you do not have any stuff, just come and shop and get something great!

Free admission - No charge for displays - Tables are supplied by the Inn

When you RSVP please state in the comment box if you are bringing stuff or just coming to shop. 

Invite your friends and neighbors to come shop too!

Event time is 10 am - 1 pm

Sellers may set up any time after 8 am.

 

Sellers may bring pictures of larger items (i.e. furniture) and then make arrangements later.

Advertising
I'm going to list this on craigslist, yardsale lists, etc.
If you know of any place you can post this, please do so.
I'm also going to try to get a sign to put outside on the street that day.

I'm advertising this as follows:

Upscale Yard Sale
New or Like New Items for Sale
at La Quinta Inn Milford
10 am - 1 pm
item.name: Sale Swap and Shop
